members.name: StorageManager.estimate()
members.description: Returns a StorageEstimate object containing usage and quota numbers for your origin.

members.name: StorageManager.persist()
members.description: Returns a Promise that resolves to true if the user agent is able to persist your site's storage.

members.name: StorageManager.persisted()
members.description: Returns a Promise that resolves to true if persistence has already been granted for your site's storage.
